channel.title: the hearse’s Personal Site on the hearse
channel.description: Recent content in the hearse’s Personal Site on the hearse

item.title: Do not sign the RMS open letter
item.description: It is disappointing to see the sheer amount of hate, immaturity and discontent towards RMS in the recent return to FSF scandal. There is no Free software movement without Richard Stallman. You may not agree with everything he has ever expressed, but that is no reason to demand him to be put down. Discarding a man based on statements you disagree with, that have nothing to do with his message is dishonest and unbelievably disgusting. Please sign the RMS support letter to give Richard Stallman support.

item.title: Using NetBSD on the desktop, personal notes for dwm and such
item.description: Table of contents: Useful NetBSD commands to get working installation with DWM To fix SSL errors with curl and git Good website to get sauce Get a good mirror dwm won’t compile Use this command to find the missing file. NetBSD FreeBSD Useful NetBSD commands to get working installation with DWM I might need this in the future, really don’t want to figure it out again and it’s good website-filler.
